wenath sanskruthiyak bihikala yam nirmanayan elesama apada bhawitha kalahoth eya anukaranaya kirimaki.anukaranayakadi eyin ape ananyayathawaya nirupanaya nowe.wenath sanskruthiyak bihikala yam nirmanayan ape sanskruthiyata galapena lesa wenas kara bhawithayata ganima awashoshanayayi.buddhagame aabhashayen nagarjuna swamin wahanse nirmanayakala shunayathawadaya hithukotagena bharathiyayan nirmanayakala shunaya hewath binduwa yana sankalpaya ha ganithaya sadaha bhawithakala sanketha yuropayata giye abu abdulla muhamad nam parsiyanu jathika ganithagnyaya wisini.emenma muslim jathikayan, bharathayen bihiwu ema dashamaya paddhathiya ha ewakata pawathi wenath sankethath siya sanskruthiyata awasheshayanakaragena owunta aawenika sanketha krathamayak bihikarana ladi.eya pahatha arabi sanketha ha hindu sanketha desa balimedida pahadiliwe.

ema departhamenthuwa pawasana paridi elesa padu labimata pradhana hethuwa wi aththe lori ha anekuth wahana lankawata genwima nisa wawilikaruwan siya nishpadana kolambaata ragena eema sandaha eki prawahana kramawalata yomu wimaya.

kalinda sandahan kala paridi mema pramanayema widulibalagarayak dolar miliyana 175kin idikaranne keseda yana panaya mathuweyi. 2016 aprel 04 dina parlimenthuwe pawathi widuli arbudaya saha pasugiya miladi ganim pilibandawa wiwadayedi janatha wimukthi peramune parlimenthu manthri sunil handunneththi pawasa aththe widulibala mandalaya padu labima pilibanda adahas dakwamin widulibala mandalaya 63% ayithiya athi lanka tranfomars limitang samagama ha anubaddha samagam labana ayuthu labhaya gana soya baliya yuthu bawaya.
